revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = DIY HTPC |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.khadas.com/vim3l |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Khadas_VIM3L |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = Unofficially |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Khadas |model = Vim |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = 3L |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 02/16/2020 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/Khadas_VIM3L |wlclass = AC1200 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Amlogic;S905D3; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A55 |cpu1spd = 1.9 GHz |is_doc = |bus = 64-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;KLMAG1JETD-B041; |flash1size = 16 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Winbond;25Q128FWPG; |flash2size = 16 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = SK hynix;H9HCNNNBKMML-HRME; |ram1_num = 1 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8211FD; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = C8:63:14 |oui = 18:93:7F
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2015.01;ga4bb005-dirty; |stockos = Linux;4.9.113;Android 9;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, USB 3.0, Mini PCIe, Micro SD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5-20 |pwr_amp_dc = <!-- DC Amps --> |pwr_conn = USB (Type-C)
|serial = yes, 3.3V TTL, (115200 8N1), |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Micro SD Card slot, HDMI 2.1, MIPI DSI, MIPI CSI, Bluetooth 5.0, IR receiver, RTC, I2C, I2S, GPIO, |addchip = CMOS Real Time Clock;NXP;PCF8563;;1;,,, 8-bit MCU, 8Kb Flash memory, 128b data EEPROM;ST;STM8S003;;1;,,, 4-port USB 2.0 Hub Controller;Terminus Technology;FE8.1;;1;,,, USB 3.1 SuperSpeed 10 Gbps Switch;ON Semi;FUSB340;;1;,,, Programmable USB Type-C Controller w/PD;ON Semi;FUSB302;;1;,,, 8-Bit I2C and SMBus I/O Expander;TI;TCA6408;;1;,,, ESD Suppressor Diode;TI;TPD4E05U06;;1;,,, Tri-Axis accelerometer;Kionix;KXTJ3-1057;;1;,,, Fixed 5V-8A Synchronous Buck Converter w/100mA LDO;MPS;NB679;;1;,,, Adjustable Current Power Distribution Switch;SG Micro;SGM2551A;;2;,,, Low Power, Low Dropout, RF Linear Regulator;SG Micro;SGM2036;;1;,,, Fixed 3.3V-8A Synchronous Buck Converter w/100mA LDO;MPS;NB680;;1;,,, 26V, 6A Synchronous Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP8756;;2;,,, 1.5A, 1.5MHz Synchronous Step-Down Regulator;Silergy;SY8030DEC;;3;,,, Ultra low dropout, 500mA, CMOS LDO;Will Semiconductor;WL2803E;;3;,,, Autoswitching Power Mux;Texas Instruments;TPS2115A;;1;,,, |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Shenzhen Wesion Tech |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Ubuntu, OpenWrt (unofficially)
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 08/2019 |estprice = 49.99 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B081H2P9KL |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = AMPAK AP6398S |rad1modif = SDIO/UART |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43598; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |acqam1 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad1ac = 867 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 300/300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{See also|Khadas|Amlogic|AMPAK}}
===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Amlogic]] S905D3 @1.9GHz (64-bit) :SoC: Quad-Core ARM (Cortex-A55) :GPU: Mali-G31 MP2 @800MHz *Memory: 2GB (LPDDR4) RAM, 16GB (eMMC) Flash *WLAN: [[AMPAK]] [https://www.embeddedworks.net/wlan805/ AP6398S] • [[Broadcom]] BCM43598 :802.11abgn/ac 2T2R Wi-Fi + BT 5.0 SiP Module :Wi-Fi: SDIO 3.0/2.0, BT: UART/PCM interface
==Links of Interest== [https://docs.khadas.com/vim3/#VIM3L Documentation]
===Forum=== * [https://forum.khadas.com/c/Khadas-VIM3 Khadas Community] ===Source=== *[https://github.com/khadas GitHub] ===Articles=== *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2019/08/21/khadas-vim3l-amlogic-s905d3-sbc-targets-htpc-enthusiasts/ ''Khadas VIM3L Amlogic S905D3 SBC Targets HTPC Enthusiasts'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://liliputing.com/2019/09/khadas-vim3l-is-a-single-board-computer-aimed-at-htpc-builders-pre-orders-start-at-50.html ''Khadas VIM3L is a single-board computer aimed at HTPC builders'' on '''Liliputing''']
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = |subtarget = |arch = |support_started_version = ? |current_supported_version = ? |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = Unofficially }} Please insert instructions here
